column1: tasmE vyAkriyate nUnam mEtreyaH tu svayam taTA
column2: de ni lung bstan the tshom med // de skad byams bdag bdag nyid kyis //

column1: uvAca SAriputrAya SAli stamba upamA kRtA
column2: sh'a ri'i bu la smras pa dang // s'a lu ljang pa dper mdzad pa //

column1: SAriputraH tu tat SruttvA deva saMGa anumoditaH
column2: de ni sh'a ri'i bus thos nas //

column1: saMstutaH DRtasAraH ca gatvA utTAya praharzitaH AKyAtavAn= ca BiksuByaH AryA nAgArjuna viracitA Arya SAli stambaka sUtra kArikA samAptA
column2: snying po blangs te lha tshogs kyis //

column1: BAvatIya upADyAyena Darma SrI BadreNa mahA saMSoDaka loka cakzuH sADumati jQAna kumArAByAm ca anUditaH
column2: rjes su yi rangs mngon bstod nas //
langs te song nas dga' sems kyis /
